info.title: Healthcare Referral Management API
info.description: API for managing healthcare referrals with AI-assisted triage, notifications, and audit logging

post.description: Authenticate a staff member or admin user and receive an access token
Submit a new patient referral. The system will automatically triage the referral using AI and assign it to the appropriate department.

clinical_notes.example: Patient presents with chest pain and shortness of breath. Requires immediate cardiology consultation.

external_referral_id.description: External referral ID from the hospital system (optional, used for duplicate detection)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve information about the currently authenticated user

staff_id.description: ID of the staff member to assign
